summary: Created /lake command and skill-lake-repair for automated Lean build repair. The skill iteratively builds, parses errors, and auto-fixes missing cases (with sorry placeholders), unused variables (underscore prefix), and unused imports (line removal). Includes dry-run mode, max retries, module targeting, and cycle detection.

artifacts.summary: Direct execution skill for automated build repair with error parsing and auto-fix logic

completion_data.completion_summary: Created /lake command and skill-lake-repair direct execution skill for automated Lean build repair. Implements auto-fix for missing pattern match cases, unused variables, and unused imports with iterative retry loop and dry-run support.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added /lake command to Command Workflows section, added skill-lake-repair to Skill-to-Agent Mapping table, created .claude/commands/lake.md and .claude/skills/skill-lake-repair/SKILL.md
